name: Freetargets Trainer
description:
Freetargets Trainer

Freetargets is pleased to present the first affordable and universal shooting simulator

The Freetargets Trainer can be used in conjunction with your own firearm (DAO) or with any kind of airsoft weapon to practice at your home and dry fire training. Simply add a computer, projector and a wall and you're ready to go

Practice pulling, defending at home, or hunting with your favorite pistol, shotgun, or rifle. Use one of the existing laser bullets or an existing laser training gun to train like a pro with this simulator that offers myriad target practice

Laser bullets / laser training guns
  • LaserLyte
  • Laser Ammo / Surestrike

This trainer is the best and most simulative for its price! Expand your existing training system or create a new one with our Freetargets Trainer. Our trainer recognizes all USB cameras and does not require any installation. Find out about the countless training options on our homepage

Advantages
  • Fastest shot detection even with high camera resolutions
  • Multimonitor and touchscreen compatible, each monitor can be freely selected in every variant of a primary and secundary screen installation
  • Integrated, freely creatable and editable playlist with parameters saved separately for each game
  • Integrated rapid fire and various options for automatic weapon reloading
Training scenarios
  • DOS based oldies but goldies games
  • Windows DirectX based games
  • Console emulator games (SEGA / Nintendo / Sony Playstation / 3DO)
  • Browser based games (WEB-GL / Adobe Flash)
  • Freetargets Friend or Foe Training
Suitable weapon types
  • Real weapons (DAO)
  • Aisoft weapons
  • Paintball marker
